## `SetGraphBackgroundColor`

Sets the background color for all graphs.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetGraphBackgroundColor(number red,
                        number green,
                        number blue)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`number` red | The red channel of the color.
`number` green | The green channel of the color.
`number` blue | The blue channel of the color.
